challengeFiles.name: styles
script

tests.text: You should add the + modifier to the character class before e in your regular expression.
You should add the + modifier to the character class after e in your regular expression.

description: The + modifier in a regex allows you to match a pattern that occurs one or more times. To match your digit pattern one or more times, add a plus after each of the digit character classes. For example: [0-9]+.
